_header: My thought oppressed my mind in trouble
Note:
See Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 1074.
_description: A lament of a rejected love, without time for pleasure — four stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd31922.First Lines: My thought oppressed my mynd in troublemy body languisshyng my hart in payn…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …auenture in me to haue placenay nay for why ther ys no space
BLAdd31922.Note: Words and notation repeated for three voices.
